text:
Chapter 2:
The Bringer of Peace
—The people led them to a grand "Royal Palace".

It was a stone castle that showed considerable age.
They proceeded deeper into the corridors surrounding its courtyard.

...[Player] and the others felt a strong sense of déjà vu
regarding the castle's exterior and interior.

options.text: Still, it looks familiar...
It's the Aradisia Royal Palace, right...?

name: Danzo
text: Right...? It feels exactly like the Royal Palace of that country where we received hospitality before the festival.

name: Hydoor
text:
It's a bit old, but...
It's creepy how similar it is.
It's like we time-slipped.

name: Hydoor
text: ...Hey. A parallel universe is a world where there's another self that looks like us when we transform... right?

name: Hydoor
text:
If this is that world... I guess it makes sense that it's so similar...
Well, I don't want to meet my other self though.

name: Danzo
text:
Who knows~. I've been to other universes, but never a parallel one.
But, it's a possibility, right?

name: Danzo
text:
Because, if the environment and various other factors aren't somewhat the same,
our other selves couldn't be born, right?

name: Danzo
text: So, I think it's not strange to have a scenery similar to the world we live in~.

options.text: That's true...
Is this really a parallel universe?
The time travel theory has also come up.

name: Hydoor
text:
Haa, it just added more anxiety.
But I won't give up hope, please let this be a place where we can return by realistic means...?

name: Danzo
text:
Well... the 'King' we're about to meet, right?
It'd be great if we could ask them a lot of things~...

—Just then, the people who were leading
[Player] and the others stopped.

name: Resident?
text:
Thank you for coming all this way.
The 'King' awaits you here.
Please, come in.

At the end of the corridor.
A particularly large and luxurious door
slowly opened.

Beyond the door was the throne room.
Like other parts of the castle,
from its construction to its decorations—

Everywhere bore a striking resemblance to the Royal Palace of Aradisia Kingdom.
At the very back of the spacious room.

The person seated on a tall chair—the throne—
stood up and slowly walked towards them.
Their appearance was...

name: King
text:
—Oh, are you the ones who came from beyond the 'Rainbow'?
I... no.
Everyone, we have been eagerly awaiting you.

options.text: Alphecca... Your Majesty!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: King
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alphecca...?
Is that the name of someone you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: King
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Unfortunately, I do not know that name.
Perhaps you have mistaken me for soneone else.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...What's going on!? The King's doppelganger doesn't know the King's name,
does that mean this isn't a parallel universe?

options.text: Um... haven't we met somewhere before?

dialogue_after_selection.name: King
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No... I recall that you and I
are meeting for the first time...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Oh, no. Even the King's doppelganger has appeared.
Does this confirm this place to be a parallel universe...?

name: Hydoor
text:
Seriously...?
What are we going to do about this...

Danzo thought for a while, glancing at the disheartened Hydoor.
Then, he bowed respectfully to the "King" and began to speak.

name: Danzo
text:
—It is an honor to meet you, Your Majesty.
We have indeed come to this land from beyond the 'Rainbow'.

name: Danzo
text:
However, we know absolutely nothing
about this land connected by the 'Rainbow'.

name: Danzo
text:
Why do you welcome us, and what kind of place is this to begin with?
Could you please tell us?

options.text: Oh, Danzo is using proper respectful language...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...What kind of reaction is that?
I'm a respectable businessperson,
talking to clients is an everyday occurrence.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Especially for ninja clients, if you talk disrespectfully to important people,
your head will fly off, alright?
It's quite a tough world, you know.

options.text: You're surprisingly good at it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course. Because important people are a ninja's main clients.
You change how you speak to suit the person you're talking to—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is something that's expected.
Ninjas who can't do this get their heads chopped off, seriously.

options.text: Wow, you sound like a businessperson.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course. Because important people are a ninja's main clients.
You change how you speak to suit the person you're talking to—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is something that's expected.
Ninjas who can't do this get their heads chopped off, seriously.

name: King
text:
Hmm, I see...
So the legend of the "Rainbow Hero" remains only in this land—Endaira.

name: King
text:
No, it cannot be helped.
For they say beyond the 'Rainbow' lies another world.
...Where should I begin?

options.text: This is Endaira!?
Danzo, did you hear that?
The planet where Aradisia is, right?

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm, I wonder if the environment changed, or if it's a different region...
Anyway, this isn't the Endaira we know, is it?

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, damn it, it's getting even more confusing.
What the hell is going on...?

The "King" of Endaira pondered for a while,
and then slowly began to speak.

name: King
text:
—Our world, over thousands of years,
is slowly heading towards extinction.

name: King
text:
Once, the stars that almost covered the heavens
dwindled in number one after another, and the extraterrestrial people
with whom we once had contact also completely disappeared.

name: King
text:
...Both stars and people. They were slowly swallowed
by the 'rift' and disappeared from this world.

options.text: A 'rift'...?
Like a black hole, or something?
A really big path, perhaps...?

name: King
text:
I don't know the details myself.
A 'crack in the world' that slowly, over time,
swallows various stars...

name: King
text: That is what is currently swallowing this planet—Endaira.

name: Hydoor
text:
Right now...!?
Hold on, so this planet is going to be destroyed soon!?

name: King
text:
...To put it plainly, yes.
The only way to resist being swallowed by the 'rift'.
That is...

name: King
text:
To observe the 'rift' and close it.
The one who can do that... in other words,
the 'Hero' who can save this world—

name: King
text:
Comes across the 'Rainbow'.
We have, since ancient times, passed down that legend
for this very moment.

name: King
text:
...An 'Observer' who crossed the 'Rainbow'.
To think they would actually appear at such a critical juncture.

options.text: H-Hero...!?
Wait, wait, this suddenly got heavy.
If an 'Observer' closes it, then...

name: Danzo
text:
...I see. So, because there was such a legend,
[Player] was welcomed, mainly.
That part makes sense.

name: Danzo
text:
—However, with all due respect, there are points in your story
that I don't understand. If there were no 'Observers' originally
in this world...

name: Danzo
text:
I can understand why you would place your hopes beyond the 'Rainbow'.
However, if the verification of 'Observer' abilities
hasn't progressed to a certain extent—

name: Danzo
text:
This legend couldn't have been born.
That means, regardless of the present, there must have been 'Observers'
in the past.

options.text: Ah, that's true.
Otherwise, the word 'Observer' wouldn't even exist, right?
I didn't notice because I was just going with the flow...

name: Danzo
text:
—The true nature of the 'rift' that only an 'Observer' can close is probably a path.
But, if it was a world where 'Observers' existed...

name: Danzo
text:
And if the crisis had been occurring for thousands of years.
It's easy to infer that there would have been 'Observers' trying to stop it.

name: Danzo
text:
...Why couldn't the 'Observers' of this world close the 'rift'?
What was the reason they had no choice but to cling to the 'Hero'?

options.text: Right, someone else should have been able to do it.
Why couldn't anyone stop it for thousands of years?
Clinging to hope is quite a gamble, right?

name: King
text:
Hmm...
Your questions are valid.
Why this world is in such a hopeless situation—

name: King
text:
Of course, I've had it investigated, but
I can't explain it well. It's because I don't have as much knowledge
about 'magic' as the specialists do...

options.text: 'Magic'...?
Another new word has appeared...
So the concept of 'heroes' also exists.

name: Hydoor
text:
The more I listen, the more I don't understand...
What is 'magic'? Is it like something out of a fairy tale?

—Your Majesty.
If I may answer.

Just then. From behind [Player] and the others,
a clear voice echoed.
The owner of the voice, with the light from the open door behind them—

Entered the throne room.
What appeared was a young man, a large lion alien,
clad in a long black robe.

He carried a long staff on his shoulder,
with faintly glowing parts embedded in it, like a Parallel Weapon.

name: Resident?
text:
—Master Wizard!
The Great Wizard has arrived!

name: Resident?
text:
He even perfectly predicted the appearance of the 'Rainbow' this time.
As expected of the Great Wizard...

The people around them began to buzz at his appearance.
However, he himself showed no interest in it.

He walked past [Player] and the others,
and stepped forward before the "King".

options.text: Next is the 'Great Wizard'...
This is truly a fantasy world.
Oh, someone to my liking has arrived.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You... well, never mind.
There's no understanding anything even if I try to take it seriously.

name: Hydoor
text:
These guys are probably being serious, but...
It's a world that makes you wonder if they're joking.
I can't keep up...

name: King
text:
Oh, Great Wizard Gnomon.
Well met. Indeed, you would be able to explain it more thoroughly than I.

name: King
text:
Then, I entrust you with the task of answering these people's questions.
I'm counting on you.

The young man called Gnomon nodded lightly,
then turned to [Player] and the others—

He held up his staff. Then,
several transparent, window-like displays appeared around the staff—

And on each, what looked like text
scrolled rapidly.
He skimmed through them all.

name: Gnomon
text:
—I see.
It's not surprising that people of this era
don't know 'magic'...

Gnomon put a hand to his chin and pondered for a while.
Then, as if choosing his words carefully, he began to speak.

name: Gnomon
text:
...My apologies for the delayed greeting.
I am Gnomon El Korphen.
I am called the Great Wizard.

name: Gnomon
text:
A Wizard is... well, you could understand it as something like a 'scientist'
in your world.

options.text: So, a scientist...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes.
Strictly speaking, there's no equivalent profession,
but.

options.text: Nice to meet you, Gnomon...-kun?

dialogue_after_selection.text: Gnomon bowed lightly to [Player]'s greeting.

options.text: Hm? Korphen, I've heard that somewhere...

name: Hydoor
text:
Huh... well, it has the title 'Great' attached to it,
so I guess he's quite important in his field.

name: Hydoor
text:
Alright, then explain it properly in words we can understand, okay?
I haven't understood a single thing so far.

name: Resident?
text:
Oh...!
Even if they are companions of one who could be a 'Hero'—
What reckless words to speak to the Great Wizard...!

name: Resident?
text:
You, watch your mouth.
If he takes notice of you, you're finished.
I don't want to die yet, I tell you...!

name: Danzo
text:
...Ah... perhaps he's
of an extremely noble status?

name: Gnomon
text:
...That's not the case, but.
What do those people think of us, I wonder.

He let out a deep sigh, then recomposed his expression
as if to collect himself, and Gnomon opened his mouth again.

name: Gnomon
text:
—First, regarding the 'rift'.
As that person guessed, its true nature
is one gigantic path.

name: Gnomon
text:
This universe continues to expand by continuously drawing Ether
from other universes through that path.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ether has a characteristic that when it exceeds a certain threshold
and becomes dense, it turns into Ether crystal...

name: Gnomon
text:
And this universe too... originally, it was supposed to meet its demise
by crystallizing entirely due to the excessive influx of Ether
beyond its limits.

name: Gnomon
text:
However, that didn't happen. The universe, to adapt to the excessive influx of Ether,
began to expand itself.

name: Gnomon
text:
As the universe stretched, the distances between stars grew further and further apart,
resulting in regions that couldn't be observed from any star.

name: Gnomon
text:
It repeatedly combined, engulfing those unobservable regions,
and finally transformed into one giant path, that is the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
And the phenomenon where people and objects sucked in by the 'rift'
along with Ether from parallel universes are expelled with plasma—

name: Gnomon
text: That is the 'Rainbow' that brought you to this universe.

options.text: The universe is expanding, huh...
A super huge path on a cosmic scale...
It's all quite beyond imagination.

name: Danzo
text:
Um... I don't get it right away.
Does Ether really flow between universes like water?

name: Gnomon
text:
No. Normally, even if connected by a path, there's only a slight exchange;
it doesn't flow much unless artificially manipulated.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's a substance that constantly circulates
within the closed vessel of the universe.
That's what Ether is.

name: Gnomon
text:
Originally, inflow and outflow
shouldn't occur.

name: Gnomon
text:
...And it was our ancestors who unfortunately
caused an artificial flow.

name: Gnomon
text:
It seems to be the result of trying to obtain Ether
exceeding the total amount of this universe,
for the purpose of operating the technology that utilizes Ether as a power source.

name: Danzo
text:
Haa~... I often hear the name Ether engine,
so I thought it was like an infinite energy source, but—

name: Danzo
text:
It can run out, too, huh?
Well, anyway, I guess I understand how dangerous this 'rift' thing is?

name: Hydoor
text:
...And that the place we're in now is
a different universe, too.
Haa... is it confirmed, then...?

name: Hydoor
text:
—So? Why is such a dangerous thing
left alone? I haven't heard the answer to that yet.

name: Gnomon
text:
...The people of this universe, from the moment they recognized the existence of the 'rift',
have tried every possible means to close it.

name: Gnomon
text:
However, no matter how many 'Observers' in this universe they gathered,
they ultimately failed to close the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
Thanks to their noble sacrifices,
they were able to identify the method to some extent, but...

name: Gnomon
text:
By that time, it had become clear from statistical information that
'Observers' capable of realizing that method could no longer be born in this universe.

name: Gnomon
text: 'Observers' have been conspicuously decreasing, and their observation abilities are also getting weaker and weaker.

name: Gnomon
text: We're even seeing 'Observers' who can't even stably maintain a hero's transformation.

name: Gnomon
text:
In this world, where both the number and ability of 'Observers' are dwindling,
the appearance of an 'Observer' who can close the 'rift' is—

name: Gnomon
text:
In a rather hopeless situation, I would say.
Because controlling a large path requires that much ability.

options.text: How is the increase/decrease of 'Observers' determined?
Is it something that happens naturally...?
Hmm, I understand the situation is desperate.

name: Danzo
text:
I see... So, that's why they had no choice but to bet
on a powerful 'Observer' coming from an outer universe, right?

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. The conclusion reached long ago, which was passed down through generations,
is the legend of the 'Hero'.

name: Gnomon
text:
If a universe that still has the potential to
produce powerful 'Observers' connects with the 'Rainbow',
and an 'Observer' comes from there—

name: Gnomon
text:
No. If they don't come,
the 'rift' will never be closed.
That's why...

name: Gnomon
text:
If such an 'Observer' appears,
they should be entrusted with the greatest hope—
and treated as the 'Hero'.

name: Hydoor
text:
So that's what all this fuss is about...
Well, I don't know what's expected of a 'Hero' but—

name: Hydoor
text:
I also know that [Player] is a great 'Observer'.
It's always being talked about.

name: Resident?
text:
Oh...!
To be able to transform two people at once,
I thought it might be possible...!

name: Resident?
text: At last, at last, the true 'Hero' may have appeared!

At Hydoor's words, the crowd immediately became excited.
Sparkling gazes were directed at [Player].

options.text: I-Is this... bad?
It feels like they're going to make us close the 'rift'.
I just want to go home, though...

name: Danzo
text:
...[Player]-kun.
Could I borrow your ear for a moment?

Saying that, Danzo approached [Player]
and spoke in a voice quiet enough that others couldn't hear.

name: Danzo
text:
I'm not an expert on paths, but.
If that 'rift' thing became an 'entrance'
and blew us here—

name: Danzo
text: There's a chance we could use it as an 'exit', right?

name: Danzo
text: Because, we were just connected to our universe until a moment ago, weren't we?

name: Danzo
text:
I think it's definitely worth looking for it.
...For now, could you try to find the 'rift'
on your own?

options.text: I-I see...?
I'll give it a try.

text:
[Player] closed their eyes and listened intently,
beginning to search for the location of the path.
It was the same method used for detecting monsters.

They stretched their consciousness outward, relying on memory to trace the path.
This was the method taught to them by Exio and Meride.

The path they came from, the place they fell.
From there, they extended their consciousness straight upwards, higher and higher.
—However.

options.text: Hmm... I can't reach it...
It might not be in that spot anymore.
Did it move?

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm... I see.
Then how about—
We rely on these people?

name: Danzo
text:
Especially Gnomon-kun, he knows an awful lot about the 'rift', right?
I bet he has some information about how to find it.

name: Danzo
text:
...Hey, hey. Just a little, can I try to negotiate
as if we're 'going to look for the rift'?

options.text: OK, I'll leave it to you.
Just 'going to look' for it, then.
It's fine, but... will it be okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It'll be alright, leave it to me.
I'm pretty good at this kind of thing.

text:
Danzo winked, then turned away from [Player]'s face
and faced the "King" and Gnomon.

name: Danzo
text:
—I largely understand your story.
This [Player] is indeed
a highly capable 'Observer'.

name: Danzo
text:
However, even with their abilities,
locating the 'rift' seems to be
an extremely difficult task.

name: Danzo
text:
It would be helpful if you could assist us in reaching a place
where we can access the 'rift'...

name: King
text:
...Hmm.
So even someone who could be the 'Hero'
has difficulties.

name: King
text: But that is precisely why we have summoned sir Gnomon.

name: King
text:
If you, as the 'Hero', would exert yourself to close the 'rift',
I shall assign this person to accompany you on your journey.

name: King
text:
Of course, the travel expenses required for that journey
shall be provided by us.
How does that sound?

name: Danzo
text:
Oh...
Better terms than I expected
came out so easily.

name: Gnomon
text:
...We are a clan that has existed specifically to aid the 'Hero'.
If it is your command, I shall follow.

name: Gnomon
text:
Regarding how to close the 'rift', it's still under research,
but if we get closer, we'll gain more data, and the research will progress.

name: Gnomon
text:
I am proficient in auxiliary magic for detecting the 'rift',
and all magic expected to be necessary in the process of closing it.

name: Gnomon
text: I believe I can be of considerable use.

Saying that, Gnomon lowered his gaze.
Meanwhile, Hydoor beckoned Danzo and [Player], forming a circle.

name: Hydoor
text:
—Hey, what are we gonna do?
They've really cornered us.
Are we really gonna become 'Heroes'?

options.text: Well, you know...
Right now, I really don't know how to get back.
We have no choice but to place our last hope on the 'rift'...

name: Danzo
text:
You're right... Aid from our original world is unlikely,
and if we take our sweet time, it'll be game over along with this planet.

name: Danzo
text:
So, I think it's best to aim to reach the 'rift' first,
even if it means borrowing their help.

name: Danzo
text:
As for whether it can be closed...
Well, that's up to [Player]-kun, you know.

name: Danzo
text:
It'll work out somehow!
It's not like there's absolutely no chance!

name: Hydoor
text:
You said that so casually!
I can't tell if you're smart or stupid anymore!

name: Hydoor
text:
Haa... When I think about having to carry the burden
of saving the world or whatever,
it's really annoying... The compensation is too extreme.

name: Hydoor
text:
Well, I'll leave what to do up to [Player].
We're in this together now, after all.

options.text: Hmm... I guess so.
It's almost like there's no choice at all...

text:
[Player] turned towards the "King"
and gave their answer to the request.

options.text: I'll accept the journey to close the 'rift'.
Let's fulfill our mission as 'Heroes'.
For now, I'll just look for it.

name: King
text:
Oh... 'Hero' [Player]!
You will accept it!

Seeing the "King's" face beam with delight,
the people present became greatly excited,
and cheers erupted.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Good.
It may be a short acquaintance, but
please accept my sincerest regards, Hero-sama.

Gnomon also relaxed his cheeks slightly,
and bowed to [Player].

options.text: No, no, same to you.
I'll be counting on you.
Being called 'Hero-sama' feels a bit ticklish...

name: Gnomon
text:
—By the way.
Who exactly are those two
who are with you?

name: Gnomon
text:
Since they transformed and fought monsters,
I can infer that they are not 'Observers' but heroes... right?

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, that's right!
We haven't introduced ourselves and everything yet!
I'm Danzo!

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm, what's the right way to describe our relationship?
If I were to summarize it simply and clearly...

name: Danzo
text:
Precisely, a legendary hero and his capable retainers!
—Something like that, perhaps!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Hold on, who's a retainer!?
Even I, who summarized it casually,
wouldn't talk nonsense!!

name: Danzo
text:
Huh!?
I thought it was easy to understand~?
At least, that's what I intend to be!?

name: Danzo
text:
Then what exactly is Hy-kun to [Player]-kun?
You were the first one to put yourself on the line, weren't you?

name: Hydoor
text:
Th-That was just because I happened to be close, so my body reacted on its own...!
Besides, stop calling me that—

name: Gnomon
text:
—I see. In other words,
Danzo-sama and Hy-kun-sama will be your companions on this journey.

name: Hydoor
text:
See, there you go, it got misunderstood again!
'Hy-kun-sama,' what are you going to do about that!?

name: Gnomon
text:
The closer you get to the 'rift',
the higher the encounter rate with monsters will be.
In other words...

name: Gnomon
text:
If you are to accompany us, you will need to possess adequate means
of counteracting them.
—May I test your abilities?

options.text: Test our abilities, you say...?
Are you going to battle us?

name: Gnomon
text:
—I am a hero, too.
For this day, I have trained and studied enough
not to be troubled in battles against monsters.

name: Gnomon
text:
I also have some practical experience.
However, those who can defend themselves must do so.

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm, I see~?
You seem pretty confident, don't you?
But, it doesn't have to be right here, right now...

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmph, no way.
Why should I be judged by you?
Ridiculous.

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see. So, Hy-kun-sama possesses
enough confidence to say that.
Or—

name: Gnomon
text:
Is it because you lack confidence in your own abilities
that you are afraid to show them?
Which is it?

name: Hydoor
text:
A... Argh!?
Don't talk down to me, you bastard!!
Of course I'm not lacking confidence!!

name: Hydoor
text:
I'm not the kind of person who would lose to a bookworm like you!
Come at me!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see what you said.
I would be pleased if you could demonstrate
that confidence is well-founded.

options.text: Ah, words of war...
Still too easy to provoke...
This guy is pretty aggressive, huh?

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, no, you just stirred up a hornet's nest!!
Hy-kun, you really need to do something about your lack of resistance to provocation!?

name: Gnomon
text:
—Your Majesty.
May I borrow the field and your power?

name: King
text:
Hmm... Very well.
Even if it is my command, I suppose you wish to depart
with your own conviction.

name: King
text:
You must truly 'test' them, and nothing more, you understand?
It would be a terrible sight if injuries occurred just as we're about to begin.

name: King
text:
To lend power, you mean to summon your form from another world, right?
Leave it to me.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Why is it that despite only having a vague understanding of parallel universes and paths,
they are able to become 'Observers'? It's mysterious.

name: Gnomon
text:
Of course, I intend to be careful not to overdo it.
—Then, let's begin.

Gnomon took out a faintly glowing coin-shaped object from his robe
and inserted it into an opening on his staff.

Then he swung the staff and thrust it into the floor.
Then—

name: Hydoor
text: Whoa—! What, what is this!?

name: Danzo
text:
—Phew.
To think there's such a high-tech simulated field
in a retro throne room.

Translucent walls began to rise around Hydoor, Danzo, and Gnomon,
and the floor rapidly changed its appearance—

Eventually, a futuristic virtual battle field
appeared in the center of the throne room.

It was exactly like the simulated battle fields
seen in UEHA training facilities and the like.

options.text: Why is there such equipment in a place like this!?
Amazing, how does it work!?
Wait, the King was an 'Observer'!?

text:
Once the field was constructed,
Gnomon signaled the "King" again.
—Then.

Along with a luminous glow engulfing his body,
Gnomon's attire changed. His black robe transformed
into a white coat that seemed highly mobile—

And the staff in his hand changed into a mechanical one
shaped like a broom.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Thank you for your assistance, Your Majesty.
My transformation is complete.

options.text: He suddenly became sci-fi-esque...!
Oh, cool!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Isn't he blushing?
...But, that doesn't matter!!

options.text: Hmm, an outfit that looks like it'd be fun to take off.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You. You have surprisingly twisted tastes...
But! That doesn't matter!!

name: Hydoor
text:
Tch, I'll take you on!
[Player], transform!!

name: Danzo
text:
Please take care of me too~.
Well, let's see what you've got.

In response to the request, [Player] transformed
Hydoor and Danzo.

name: Hydoor
text:
Sharaaaah!!
Come on, I'll make you cry uncle!!

name: Danzo
text:
Now, now, calm down!
Something like, 'Please be gentle, okay?'
Good game!

A roaring Hydoor, a casually greeting Danzo.
Gnomon turned towards the two, aimed the tip of his staff,
as tall as himself, at them, and braced himself.

name: Gnomon
text:
—The essence of magic is immediate decision, immediate execution.
I shall demonstrate an example of that.
Battle Start

name: Gnomon
text:
—Cost 3, conversion formula correction.
Shoot.

Gnomon inserted a coin-shaped object into his staff,
muttered something briefly, and swung the staff.

Then, instantly, something like a fireball
was generated at the tip of the staff and flew towards Hydoor and the others.

name: Hydoor
text:
Whoa whoa!?
Tch, this guy, I can't close the distance at all...!

Hydoor took evasive action, yet continuously tried to approach Gnomon.
But he was completely blocked by the fireballs.

options.text: A sniping-type Parallel Weapon...!
Bad compatibility with Hydoor, who excels in close combat!
Danzo, can you do something!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
Don't underestimate me, boss!

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm, so it's a fighting style that absolutely maintains a certain distance, huh?
But—
I'm not just a close-combat specialist either, you know!?

Danzo jumped high into the air, took out a kunai
he had concealed in his robe, and threw it towards Gnomon.

Gnomon barely dodged it, while burning a part of it with a fireball,
and pushed back towards Danzo.

name: Danzo
text:
Yeah!?
OKOK, his dynamic vision is
pretty good, I guess!?

name: Hydoor
text:
—Whoa there!
Don't forget you've got another opponent here too, you know!?

Hydoor, seizing the opportunity while Gnomon's gaze
was on Danzo, fired his anchor.

Around the anchor that reached the opposite wall,
a pool of water appeared, dragging Gnomon's feet down.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ugh...!
Damn it!

name: Hydoor
text:
Alright, don't think you can move freely in my ocean!?
Danzo! Pincer attack!

name: Danzo
text:
Aye aye, Hy-kun!
Then with this—

Doing flip after flip, Danzo quickly
circled around to Gnomon's back.

And Hydoor, too, swam through the "sea" at an incredible speed,
approaching Gnomon. And then—

name: Danzo
text:
With this, checkmate.
...Is that right?

Hydoor grabbed Gnomon's leg,
and Danzo placed a chakram against Gnomon's neck.

name: Gnomon
text:
...........
I surrender.

With Gnomon's surrender declaration,
the battlefield began to change,
returning to the original throne room.

name: Resident?
text:
Oh...!
The Hero's retainers have defeated the
Great Wizard!

name: Resident?
text:
As expected of the Hero's party!
This, they might truly close the 'rift' after all...!

Ignoring the bustling crowd,
Gnomon bowed to the "King" and gave a signal.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Thank you for the match.
You two are truly strong.
As expected of those who profess to be retainers.

Then Gnomon undid his transformation,
and bowed to the two, and to [Player].

name: Gnomon
text:
My sincerest apologies for my numerous cases of impoliteness.
Once again, regarding this journey,
I humbly ask for your cooperation.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmph. For someone who was so eager to provoke,
you're not half bad, I must say.
I've gained a bit of respect for you.

name: Danzo
text:
Now, now. It's good that the two hot-blooded ones have calmed down.
Since we're forming a party,
let's get along and have fun!

options.text: You're right, we don't want to be at odds.
I'm glad we could understand each other...
Nice to meet you again, Gnomon-kun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Yes, same here.
I will surely prove to be useful.

name: Hydoor
text:
...I should correct you, just in case.
My name isn't 'Hy-kun', it's Hydoor.
Don't get it wrong.

name: Hydoor
text:
Well, I'm counting on you.
After all, it seems I'll be in your care.

name: Gnomon
text:
Eh? ...Oh.
I see, 'Hy-kun' was a nickname.
My apologies, I'll remember that.

name: Hydoor
text:
And remember that I don't approve of that nickname either... Haa.
Hitomi, you're gonna get it when I get back.

name: Danzo
text:
I already introduced myself, didn't I?
Well then, nice to meet you again!
Gnomon-kun!

Saying that, Danzo held out his hand towards Gnomon,
as if asking for a handshake. Then—

Gnomon flinched, his body trembling,
and distanced himself from the approaching Danzo.

name: Gnomon
text:
—S-Sorry.
It was just my reflexes...
Nice to meet you.

And, he hesitantly returned Danzo's handshake.
His expression seemed stiff, somehow.

name: Danzo
text:
...Let's take it easy.
I'm not going to eat you or anything.

Danzo, perhaps sensing something,
whispered to Gnomon in a low, yet deliberately soft, voice.

options.text: Eh, what, what happened?
Oh no, Danzo scared him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh!? Am I the bad guy!?
Even though I'm acting like such a clever and friendly ninja!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Unfortunately, there are moments when I feel
something in you that makes even me shudder.

options.text: Is he not good with handshakes, perhaps...?

name: Danzo
text:
Now, now, don't worry about it too much.
Everyone has their strengths and weaknesses.

name: King
text:
—It seems that a team has been successfully formed.
That is most welcome.

name: King
text:
Now, everyone must be hungry by now.
To celebrate the birth of the 'Hero', and to pray that their journey
will be fruitful—

name: King
text:
I would like to hold a small banquet.
—Everyone, please prepare.

The crowd responded to the "King's" call with short, clear replies.
Each of them murmured something and held their hands up to the sky.

Then, light again dwelled in their hands.
The doors opened on their own, and chairs and tables floated in one after another.

Next, plates laden with food
arrived and lined up on the tables,
and the preparations for the banquet steadily progressed.

options.text: What's going on...!?
I saw this kind of thing in fantasy movies!
It's like they're using magic...!

name: Danzo
text:
Whoa, what is that!?
They don't seem to be carrying it with drones or anything!?

name: Gnomon
text:
—That's 'magic' too.
It's a low-cost type that any 'grimoire'
can handle.

name: Hydoor
text:
Another new word has appeared.
What's a 'grimoire'...?

name: Gnomon
text:
Well... if I were to compare it to something you handle,
it would be like a mobile terminal app,
or a database, perhaps.

name: Gnomon
text:
You chant the spell formula of the 'magic' you want to use,
and the terminal calls up the corresponding 'magic' and actually activates it.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Look.
Please observe the hands of the people
who are using 'magic'.

Prompted by Gnomon, they looked closely,
and indeed, it seemed that what was glowing was not their hands themselves,
but the devices on their arms.

options.text: Ah, I see, so it's that kind of app.
I see... I see, is it?
Even so, I feel like it's impossible...

name: Danzo
text:
...Hey, Gnomon-kun.
This world is still full of things we don't understand.

name: Danzo
text:
'Magic' and 'grimoires' and 'Great Wizards'.
At first glance, they all sound like incredibly archaic words—

name: Danzo
text:
The buildings and people's attire feel like they're from a much older era than ours.
However...

name: Danzo
text:
You all seem to understand everything we have and know.
And you can even handle such modern battlefields.

Then, cutting off his words,
Danzo, who had been looking at the people,
turned to Gnomon.

name: Danzo
text:
Something about it really bothers me.
The expression 'if you go back in time'
leads to our language, you know.

name: Danzo
text:
What kind of world is this exactly?
Are this world and our world... connected somehow?
Gnomon pondered Danzo's words for a while.

name: Gnomon
text:
Regarding 'magic' and 'grimoires',
I think it would be faster to explain while you actually see them later,
so I'll put that aside for now.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Regarding the relationship between your world and this world.
It is certainly a parallel universe, I believe.

name: Gnomon
text:
However... this world shares history with the world you were in.
Therefore, as a result of tracing back to past data—

name: Gnomon
text:
We were able to find the language of your era.
Though the timeline seems to be quite skewed.

name: Hydoor
text:
'Tracing back'...? The scenery of this era feels far more ancient
to us than the scenery of our own time.

name: Gnomon
text:
That too is caused by the significant discrepancy in the timeline.
This world, approximately 6000 years ago, experienced a cosmic-scale civilizational collapse—

name: Gnomon
text:
It once lost its civilization. Since then, history has been reset,
so I suppose the scenery appears more archaic than your era.

options.text: History... reset...?
6000 years... civilizational collapse...?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Yes. This universe—
Let's call it the "Endangered World" for convenience.

name: Gnomon
text:
This "Endangered World"—
is a parallel universe approximately 12,000 years in the future
from the universe you were in.

name: Gnomon
text:
In your era, this place was...
called the "Aradisia Kingdom".

—Meanwhile.
In some city in the "Endangered World".
A place like a blacksmith's, also archaic.

There, a single craftsman
was hammering hot, red iron
with a hammer.

Hmm-hmm-hmm♪
Hee-hee-hee♪
...!

Alright, this is good!
This time, I think I can make something beautiful!

The craftsman hummed contentedly,
then resumed hammering the iron,
interspersed with humming.
